name: Transcender
effects: Increase magic damage against Humans by 40%
Increase magic damage against Avians by 40%
Increase magic damage against Beasts by 40%
Increase magic damage against Plantoids by 40%
Increase magic damage against Insects by 40%

name: Transcender
種之超越者
종의 초월자
Transcendance
Transhumanist
Trascendencia
desc_short: Boost magic damage against human, plant, avian, beast and insect monsters
魔法攻擊時提高對獸鳥人形蟲植物系魔物的傷害
마법공격 시 야수, 조류, 인간, 곤충, 식물형 마물에게 주는 피해량 상승
Augmente les dégâts physiques et magiques contre les bêtes, les oiseaux, les insectes et les plantes
Erhöht physischen und magischen Schaden gegen Bestien, Vögel, Insekten und Pflanzen.
Aumenta daño físico y mágico contra bestias, aves, insectos y plantas
desc_long: Boosts magic damage inflicted on human, plantoid, beast and insect monsters.
魔法攻擊時提高對獸鳥人形蟲植物系魔物的傷害。
마법 사용 시 야수, 조류, 인간, 곤충, 식물형 마물에 대한 피해량이 상승합니다.
Augmente les dégâts physiques et magiques contre les bêtes, les oiseaux, les insectes et els plantes
Erhöht physischen und magischen Schaden gegen Bestien, Vögel, Insekten und Pflanzen.
Aumenta daño físico y mágico contra bestias, aves, insectos y plantas.
